mapper.delete: delete from TBL_MESSAGES where UNAUDIT_ID = #{unauditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and UNAUDIT_TYPE = #{unauditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT TBL_MESSAGES_Sequence.nextval AS MESSAGE_ID FROM DUAL
insert into TBL_MESSAGES
MESSAGE_ID,
UNAUDIT_ID,
UNAUDIT_TYPE,
USER_ID,
#{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{unauditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unauditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update TBL_MESSAGES
UNAUDIT_ID = #{unauditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNAUDIT_TYPE = #{unauditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select 1 as MESSAGE_ID,count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'MBDTemplate' then MESSAGE_ID end) as MBDTemplateCount, count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'Finished' then MESSAGE_ID end ) as FinishedProductCount, count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'Standard' then MESSAGE_ID end) as StandardCount, count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'Annotation' then MESSAGE_ID end) as AnnotationCount, count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'Feature' then MESSAGE_ID end) as FeatureCount, count(case when UNAUDIT_TYPE = 'Material' then MESSAGE_ID end) as MaterialCount, count(*) as AllMessagesCount from TBL_MESSAGES where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} group by USER_ID
